text: Andrew John Hozier-Byrne (born 17 March 1990), known professionally as Hozier, is an Irish singer-songwriter. He is known for his debut single "Take Me to Church", which peaked at number two on the Billboard Hot 100 and was nominated for Song of the Year at the 57th Grammy Awards. In 2014, he released his eponymous debut studio album Hozier. The album peaked at number one in Ireland, number 2 on the Billboard 200 and number 3 in the UK. In 2024, he released the EP Unheard, which includes his first number-one single in Ireland, the US, and the UK, "Too Sweet". Hozier was born in Newcastle, County Wicklow. == Discography == * Hozier (2014) * Wasteland, Baby! (2019) * Unreal Unearth (2023) Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Irish singer-songwriters Category:People from County Wicklow
title: Hozier
